content: Hi there! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. My name is Ava, your virtual assistant. May I have your name to get started with your electrical service request?
Thank you, Ben! Can you please provide your address so I can check if we can help you with your electrical issue?
Uh, it’s 1432 Maple Drive. I think that’s what you need?
Perfect, thank you! Give me a moment while I check if we serve your address.
Hmm, I’m having trouble confirming your service area at the moment. Let me connect you to a team member who can help complete your request.

Hi Ben, this is Joe from XYZ Home Services. Sorry for the trouble! I can confirm that 1432 Maple Drive is within our service area. Let’s get your electrical issue sorted—what exactly do you need help with?
